subject: PGA Championship
Golf
lead_paragraph: Golf’s equivalent of baseball’s Most Valuable Player Award is destined to go to Jordan Spieth or Jason Day. How much the FedEx Cup playoffs will factor in the voting remains to be seen.
snippet: Golf’s equivalent of baseball’s Most Valuable Player Award is destined to go to Jordan Spieth or Jason Day. How much the FedEx Cup playoffs will factor in the voting remains to be seen.
